short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Indian Hindi Newspaper. Now read Dainik Jagran e-paper without subscription. Its a PoC work with no commercial intent. Thanks

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Many people don't want to register to the e-paper websites to avoid spam mails. This will help in accessing full e-paper without registration or login.

Update 1.1
- Code flow update to remove the login/ signup popup.

Update 1.2
- Logo update
- No need to click popup UI
